hero.subtitle: Software Engineer & Digital Media Specialist blending technology with cinematic storytelling.

story: I specialize in creating premium visual and digital experiences that merge technical precision with creative direction. From commercial photography to professional video production, my work focuses on delivering content that communicates brand identity with clarity and impact.

info.text: Passionate about cinematic storytelling and visual design
Experienced in photography, video, and frontend development

highlights.photography: Commercial & product photography with cinematic lighting.
highlights.video: Professional video editing and visual storytelling.

slides: Precision cinematic stabilization for smooth professional footage.
Capture high-quality aerial views with cinematic motion.
Advanced gimbal motion for filmmakers and creators.
Detailed shots capturing every angle with clarity.
Versatile product shots for premium web experiences.
High-quality visual storytelling inspired by DJI.
